h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: The terrifying creature will lunge down with a scream, and then begin to spew a literal river of poison into a narrow arena. This stream of bile will damage you continuously, and there are only two real ways to avoid it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
The terrifying creature will lunge down with a scream, and then begin to spew a literal river of poison into a narrow arena. This stream of bile will damage you continuously, and there are only two real ways to avoid it.
